titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide for increases in the minimum wage, and for other purposes.
A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide for increases in the minimum wage, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
